thread.title: Wawrinka downs Stepanek, next races Ito again at Japan Open
thread.title_full: Wawrinka downs Stepanek, next races Ito again at Japan Open

title: Wawrinka downs Stepanek, next races Ito again at Japan Open
text:
Eugene Hoshiko Wawrinka downs Stepanek, next races Ito again at Japan Open 
Stan Wawrinka of Switzerland returns a shot against Czech Republic's Radek Stepanek in their men's singles first round match at the Japan Open men’s tennis tournament in Tokyo, Tuesday, Oct. 6, 2015. (AP Photo/Eugene Hoshiko) Eugene Hoshiko Wawrinka downs Stepanek, next races Ito again at Japan Open 
Stan Wawrinka of Switzerland reacts after winning the first set against Czech Republic's Radek Stepanek in their men's singles first round match at the Japan Open men’s tennis tournament in Tokyo, Tuesday, Oct. 6, 2015. (AP Photo/Eugene Hoshiko) Posted: Monday, October 5, 2015 11:48 pm Wawrinka downs Stepanek, next races Ito again at Japan Open Associated Press | 
TOKYO (AP) — French Open winner Stan Wawrinka secured his second-round spot at the Japan Open by beating Czech veteran Radek Stepanek in straight sets on Tuesday, avoiding a repeat of last year's shock exit. 
The top-seeded Wawrinka crashed out to local wildcard Tatsuma Ito in the first round in 2014, and the Swiss will face Ito again in the second round after overpowering Stepanek 7-5, 6-3. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety. You
